
List of Message Topics
======================

.. DO NOT EDIT THIS DOCUMENT.

.. It is autogenerated from fedmsg_meta_fedora_infrastructure/doc_utilities.py

This document lists all the topics coming out the Fedora
Infrastructure fedmsg bus.  Example messages are included
as well as descriptions and sample output from ``fedmsg.meta``.

.. note:: All topics from Fedora Infrastructure are prefixed with
   ``org.fedoraproject.prod.``, but the :term:`topic_prefix` is omitted here
   for brevity.  For instance, the item listed as ``git.branch`` will
   actually be broadcast as ``org.fedoraproject.prod.git.branch``.

.. note:: Message bodies can contain some useful information, but be wary.
   We have done as good a job as we can *securing* fedmsg, but it is still
   a new system.  If you receive a message from pkgdb claiming that "ralph"
   is the new owner of the kernel, you should still *check* with the *actual*
   pkgdb service that this is the case.  Write code against fedmsg messages
   as a tip, but always check the authoritative source before taking any
   programmatic action.


anitya
------

anitya.distro.add
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a new Linux distribution is added
to the database of `anitya <https://release-monitoring.org>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.distro.add topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.distro.add>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'crypto': 'x509',
      'i': 3,
      'msg': { 'distro': { 'name': 'CentOS'},
               'message': { 'agent': 'olasd@debian.org', 'distro': 'CentOS'},
               'project': None},
      'msg_id': '2014-1f52337a-8dbe-48f1-baad-f2c770c60640',
      'timestamp': 1412327834,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.distro.add',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.distro.add                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | olasd@debian.org added the distro named "CentOS" to anitya |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/distros                     |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set([])                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['distros/CentOS'])                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |f539edab-1193-4c0c-bac9-60db13a5a0dc-icon|                |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |f539edab-1193-4c0c-bac9-60db13a5a0dc-secondary_icon|      |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |f539edab-1193-4c0c-bac9-60db13a5a0dc-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |f539edab-1193-4c0c-bac9-60db13a5a0dc-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/e202b61fca3f40ccc4c790d4ecf6ed42?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



anitya.distro.edit
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a Linux distribution's entry is
edited in the `anitya <https://release-monitoring.org>`_ database.

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.distro.edit topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.distro.edit>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'crypto': 'x509',
      'i': 5,
      'msg': { 'distro': { 'name': 'Debia'},
               'message': { 'agent': 'pingou@fedoraproject.org',
                            'new': 'Debian',
                            'old': 'Debia'},
               'project': None},
      'msg_id': '2014-746c39cf-9fb0-4ed1-a817-d57bc901e027',
      'timestamp': 1412328814,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.distro.edit',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.distro.edit                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou changed a distro name from "Debia" to "Debian" |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/distros                |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['distros/Debian', 'distros/Debia'])              |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |f71213ee-74c2-4b93-9bbb-3bc65b867d41-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |f71213ee-74c2-4b93-9bbb-3bc65b867d41-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |f71213ee-74c2-4b93-9bbb-3bc65b867d41-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |f71213ee-74c2-4b93-9bbb-3bc65b867d41-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



anitya.distro.remove
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when an admin *removes* a distribution
(in the `anitya <https://release-monitoring.org>`_ database...)

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.distro.remove topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.distro.remove>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 4,
      'msg': { 'distro': { 'name': 'Arch'},
               'message': { 'agent': 'pingou@fedoraproject.org', 'distro': 'Arch'},
               'project': None},
      'msg_id': '2014-745132e5-17eb-4785-8663-fa89801a08ee',
      'timestamp': 1418315977,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.distro.remove',
      'username': 'pierrey'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.distro.remove                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou deleted the distro "Arch"                      |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/distros                |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['distros/Arch'])                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |212de644-6be7-4294-9654-0762b3a72663-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |212de644-6be7-4294-9654-0762b3a72663-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |212de644-6be7-4294-9654-0762b3a72663-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |212de644-6be7-4294-9654-0762b3a72663-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



anitya.project.add
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone adds a new project to
`anitya's <https://release-monitoring.org>`_ database.

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.project.add topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.add>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'crypto': 'x509',
      'i': 8,
      'msg': { 'distro': None,
               'message': { 'agent': 'ralph@fedoraproject.org',
                            'project': 'arrow'},
               'project': { 'backend': 'pypi',
                            'created_on': 1412328939.0,
                            'homepage': 'https://pypi.python.org/pypi/arrow',
                            'id': 5314,
                            'name': 'arrow',
                            'regex': '',
                            'updated_on': 1412328939.0,
                            'version': None,
                            'version_url': ''}},
      'msg_id': '2014-c95e6b4c-d033-43d9-9eb1-e1f92ac87c75',
      'timestamp': 1412328939,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.add',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.project.add                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph added the project "arrow" to anitya             |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/project/5314/          |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['projects/arrow'])                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |53548da9-1990-4f8b-a146-eee83cdb7e63-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |53548da9-1990-4f8b-a146-eee83cdb7e63-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |53548da9-1990-4f8b-a146-eee83cdb7e63-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |53548da9-1990-4f8b-a146-eee83cdb7e63-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



anitya.project.add.tried
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone *tries* to add a new project
to `anitya's <https://release-monitoring.org>`_ database, but that project
was already present.

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.project.add.tried topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.add.tried>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 4,
      'msg': { 'distro': None,
               'message': { 'agent': 'rbean@redhat.com', 'project': 'ansi2html'},
               'project': { 'created_on': 1386839688.0,
                            'homepage': 'https://github.com/ralphbean/ansi2html',
                            'id': 4,
                            'logs': None,
                            'name': 'ansi2html',
                            'packages': [],
                            'regex': 'DEFAULT:ansi2html',
                            'updated_on': 1386839688.0,
                            'version': None,
                            'version_url': 'PYPI-DEFAULT:ansi2html'}},
      'msg_id': '2013-154429ec-842e-4d7f-acae-8d7434b4cbff',
      'timestamp': 1386821688,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.add.tried',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.project.add.tried                                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph tried to add the project "ansi2html" to anitya (but it already exists there) |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/project/4/                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                                            |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['projects/ansi2html'])                                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |96d780ed-17ec-48f2-bbc5-96806a850c59-icon|                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |96d780ed-17ec-48f2-bbc5-96806a850c59-secondary_icon|                              |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |96d780ed-17ec-48f2-bbc5-96806a850c59-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |96d780ed-17ec-48f2-bbc5-96806a850c59-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



anitya.project.edit
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone edits the details of a
project in `anitya's <https://release-monitoring.org>`_ database.

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.project.edit topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.edit>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'crypto': 'x509',
      'i': 6,
      'msg': { 'distro': None,
               'message': { 'agent': 'ralph@fedoraproject.org',
                            'fields': ['homepage'],
                            'project': 'arrow'},
               'project': { 'backend': 'pypi',
                            'created_on': 1412328939.0,
                            'homepage': 'http://crsmithdev.com/arrow',
                            'id': 5314,
                            'name': 'arrow',
                            'regex': '',
                            'updated_on': 1412328939.0,
                            'version': None,
                            'version_url': ''}},
      'msg_id': '2014-f25b6634-d7b9-4f2d-9f93-23ef73034024',
      'timestamp': 1412329027,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.edit',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.project.edit                                                |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph edited the following fields of the "arrow" project: homepage |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/project/5314/                       |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                            |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['projects/arrow'])                                            |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |ee770463-e09d-41b7-b103-719da02ffd39-icon|                        |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |ee770463-e09d-41b7-b103-719da02ffd39-secondary_icon|              |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |ee770463-e09d-41b7-b103-719da02ffd39-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |ee770463-e09d-41b7-b103-719da02ffd39-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



anitya.project.map.new
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone maps an upstream project to a
package name in a particular distribution (in the `anitya
<https://release-monitoring.org>`_ database...)

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.project.map.new topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.map.new>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'crypto': 'x509',
      'i': 7,
      'msg': { 'distro': { 'name': 'Fedora'},
               'message': { 'agent': 'ralph@fedoraproject.org',
                            'distro': 'Fedora',
                            'new': 'python-arrow',
                            'project': 'arrow'},
               'project': { 'backend': 'pypi',
                            'created_on': 1412328939.0,
                            'homepage': 'http://crsmithdev.com/arrow',
                            'id': 5314,
                            'name': 'arrow',
                            'regex': '',
                            'updated_on': 1412329027.0,
                            'version': None,
                            'version_url': ''}},
      'msg_id': '2014-9ebf960a-115e-4568-a615-34cc7d8d462e',
      'timestamp': 1412329216,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.map.new',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.project.map.new                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph mapped the name of "arrow" in Fedora to "python-arrow"              |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/project/5314/                              |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                                            |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['python-arrow'])                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['projects/arrow', 'mappings/Fedora/python-arrow', 'distros/Fedora']) |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |323416e1-e333-4799-85cc-bab4d999d475-icon|                               |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |323416e1-e333-4799-85cc-bab4d999d475-secondary_icon|                     |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |323416e1-e333-4799-85cc-bab4d999d475-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |323416e1-e333-4799-85cc-bab4d999d475-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



anitya.project.map.remove
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone *removes* a mapping
between an upstream project and a package name in a particular
distribution (in the `anitya <https://release-monitoring.org>`_
database...)

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.project.map.remove topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.map.remove>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'crypto': 'x509',
      'i': 10,
      'msg': { 'distro': None,
               'message': { 'agent': 'pingou@fedoraproject.org',
                            'distro': 'Fedora',
                            'project': 'guake'},
               'project': { 'backend': 'Github',
                            'created_on': 1412237149.0,
                            'homepage': 'http://guake.org',
                            'id': 5311,
                            'name': 'guake',
                            'regex': '',
                            'updated_on': 1412237231.0,
                            'version': '0.5.0',
                            'version_url': 'guake/guake'}},
      'msg_id': '2014-1d43e5ab-e398-4007-8269-26b4f209d55b',
      'timestamp': 1412330764,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.map.remove',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.project.map.remove                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou deleted the mapping of "guake" project on "Fedora" |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/project/5311/              |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                   |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['projects/guake'])                                   |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |97e6a5d3-9927-4d4e-a748-0c6019b76cb9-icon|               |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |97e6a5d3-9927-4d4e-a748-0c6019b76cb9-secondary_icon|     |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+

.. |97e6a5d3-9927-4d4e-a748-0c6019b76cb9-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |97e6a5d3-9927-4d4e-a748-0c6019b76cb9-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



anitya.project.map.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone updates the mapping between
an upstream project and a package name in a particular distribution
(in the `anitya <https://release-monitoring.org>`_ database...)

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.project.map.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.map.update>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'crypto': 'x509',
      'i': 8,
      'msg': { 'distro': { 'name': 'Fedora'},
               'message': { 'agent': 'ralph@fedoraproject.org',
                            'distro': 'Fedora',
                            'edited': ['package_name'],
                            'new': 'guake',
                            'prev': 'guake2',
                            'project': 'guake'},
               'project': { 'backend': 'Github',
                            'created_on': 1412237149.0,
                            'homepage': 'http://guake.org',
                            'id': 5311,
                            'name': 'guake',
                            'regex': '',
                            'updated_on': 1412237231.0,
                            'version': '0.5.0',
                            'version_url': 'guake/guake'}},
      'msg_id': '2014-5bd228ac-4ba1-452f-b6d2-b4df53c9af14',
      'timestamp': 1412329667,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.map.update',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.project.map.update                                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph updated the name of "guake" in "Fedora" from "guake2" to "guake"                       |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/project/5311/                                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['guake', 'guake2'])                                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['projects/guake', 'mappings/Fedora/guake2', 'mappings/Fedora/guake', 'distros/Fedora']) |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |cacee5ee-80ef-4a5b-afac-70b01615c0b2-icon|                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |cacee5ee-80ef-4a5b-afac-70b01615c0b2-secondary_icon|                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |cacee5ee-80ef-4a5b-afac-70b01615c0b2-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |cacee5ee-80ef-4a5b-afac-70b01615c0b2-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



anitya.project.remove
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone *removes* a project from
`anitya's <https://release-monitoring.org>`_ database.

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.project.remove topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.remove>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'crypto': 'x509',
      'i': 11,
      'msg': { 'distro': None,
               'message': { 'agent': 'ralph@fedoraproject.org',
                            'project': 'guake'},
               'project': { 'backend': 'Github',
                            'created_on': 1412237149.0,
                            'homepage': 'http://guake.org',
                            'id': 5311,
                            'name': 'guake',
                            'regex': '',
                            'updated_on': 1412237231.0,
                            'version': '0.5.0',
                            'version_url': 'guake/guake'}},
      'msg_id': '2014-94864be5-f649-4b3f-8694-32f238ac7174',
      'timestamp': 1412331340,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.remove',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.project.remove                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph deleted the "guake" project                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/project/5311/          |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['projects/guake'])                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |35d29b8c-c838-4c4a-b1cc-ca0a828c859f-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |35d29b8c-c838-4c4a-b1cc-ca0a828c859f-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |35d29b8c-c838-4c4a-b1cc-ca0a828c859f-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |35d29b8c-c838-4c4a-b1cc-ca0a828c859f-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



anitya.project.version.remove
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when an admin *removes* a version
from a particular project (in the `anitya <https://release-monitoring.org>`_
database...)

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.project.version.remove topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.version.remove>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'distro': None,
               'message': { 'agent': 'pingou@fedoraproject.org',
                            'project': '3proxy',
                            'version': '0.7.1.1'},
               'project': { 'backend': 'custom',
                            'created_on': 1409917223.0,
                            'homepage': 'http://www.3proxy.ru/download/',
                            'id': 3,
                            'name': '3proxy',
                            'regex': None,
                            'updated_on': 1412690620.0,
                            'version': '0.7.1.1',
                            'version_url': 'http://www.3proxy.ru/download/'}},
      'msg_id': '2014-7926f638-1d0c-470c-b589-de84f5d34fad',
      'timestamp': 1415118527,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.version.remove',
      'username': 'pingou'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.project.version.remove                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou deleted the version 0.7.1.1 of "3proxy"        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/project/3/             |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['projects/3proxy'])                              |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |991f0634-51eb-401a-bd97-49c789a2dc07-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |991f0634-51eb-401a-bd97-49c789a2dc07-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |991f0634-51eb-401a-bd97-49c789a2dc07-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |991f0634-51eb-401a-bd97-49c789a2dc07-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



anitya.project.version.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The purpose of anitya is to monitor upstream projects and to
try and detect when they release new tarballs.

*This* message is an example of what gets published when **the first
tarball of a project is ever seen** by `anitya
<https://release-monitoring.org>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.project.version.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.version.update>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'crypto': 'x509',
      'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'distro': None,
               'message': { 'agent': 'anitya',
                            'old_version': '',
                            'packages': [ { 'distro': 'Fedora',
                                            'package_name': '2ping'}],
                            'project': { 'backend': 'custom',
                                         'created_on': 1412174944.0,
                                         'homepage': 'http://www.finnie.org/software/2ping/',
                                         'id': 2,
                                         'name': '2ping',
                                         'regex': None,
                                         'updated_on': 1412179539.0,
                                         'version': '2.1.1',
                                         'version_url': 'http://www.finnie.org/software/2ping/'},
                            'upstream_version': '2.1.1',
                            'versions': ['2.1.1']},
               'project': { 'backend': 'custom',
                            'created_on': 1412174944.0,
                            'homepage': 'http://www.finnie.org/software/2ping/',
                            'id': 2,
                            'name': '2ping',
                            'regex': None,
                            'updated_on': 1412179539.0,
                            'version': '2.1.1',
                            'version_url': 'http://www.finnie.org/software/2ping/'}},
      'msg_id': '2014-f4dfc3e4-8909-45d7-b929-1862efb373cf',
      'timestamp': 1412234961,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.version.update',
      'username': 'fedmsg'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.project.version.update                                             |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | A new version of "2ping" has been detected:  "2.1.1", packaged as "2ping" |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/project/2/                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['anitya'])                                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['2ping'])                                                            |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['projects/2ping'])                                                   |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |cd48f0ae-828a-4391-bae4-38a669414344-icon|                               |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | Unspecified                                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |cd48f0ae-828a-4391-bae4-38a669414344-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



anitya.project.version.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The purpose of anitya is to monitor upstream projects and to
try and detect when they release new tarballs.

*These* messages are the ones that get published when a tarball is found
that is newer than the one last seen in the `anitya
<https://release-monitoring.org>`_ database.

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.project.version.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.version.update>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'crypto': 'x509',
      'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'distro': None,
               'message': { 'agent': 'anitya',
                            'old_version': '2.1.0',
                            'packages': [ { 'distro': 'Fedora',
                                            'package_name': '2ping'}],
                            'project': { 'backend': 'custom',
                                         'created_on': 1412174944.0,
                                         'homepage': 'http://www.finnie.org/software/2ping/',
                                         'id': 2,
                                         'name': '2ping',
                                         'regex': None,
                                         'updated_on': 1412179539.0,
                                         'version': '2.1.1',
                                         'version_url': 'http://www.finnie.org/software/2ping/'},
                            'upstream_version': '2.1.1',
                            'versions': ['2.1.1']},
               'project': { 'backend': 'custom',
                            'created_on': 1412174944.0,
                            'homepage': 'http://www.finnie.org/software/2ping/',
                            'id': 2,
                            'name': '2ping',
                            'regex': None,
                            'updated_on': 1412179539.0,
                            'version': '2.1.1',
                            'version_url': 'http://www.finnie.org/software/2ping/'}},
      'msg_id': '2014-f4dfc3e4-8909-45d7-b929-1862efb373cf',
      'timestamp': 1412234961,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.version.update',
      'username': 'fedmsg'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.project.version.update                                                                |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | A new version of "2ping" has been detected:  "2.1.1" newer than "2.1.0", packaged as "2ping" |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/project/2/                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['anitya'])                                                                              |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['2ping'])                                                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['projects/2ping'])                                                                      |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |52f3fa81-dec1-4236-8c9d-6842eb92d34f-icon|                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | Unspecified                                                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |52f3fa81-dec1-4236-8c9d-6842eb92d34f-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



anitya.project.version.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The purpose of anitya is to monitor upstream projects and to
try and detect when they release new tarballs.

*These* messages are the ones that get published when a tarball is found
that is newer than the one last seen in the `anitya
<https://release-monitoring.org>`_ database.

You can view the history of `messages with the anitya.project.version.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.version.update>`_ or `all anitya messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=anitya>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 17,
      'msg': { 'distro': None,
               'message': { 'agent': 'anitya',
                            'old_version': '0.9.9',
                            'packages': [ { 'distro': 'Fedora',
                                            'package_name': 'python-sqlalchemy'},
                                          { 'distro': 'Fedora',
                                            'package_name': 'python-sqlalchemy0.5'}],
                            'project': { 'backend': 'pypi',
                                         'created_on': 1412175085.0,
                                         'homepage': 'https://pypi.python.org/pypi/SQLAlchemy',
                                         'id': 4034,
                                         'name': 'SQLAlchemy',
                                         'regex': None,
                                         'updated_on': 1426167440.0,
                                         'version': '1.0.0b1',
                                         'version_url': None,
                                         'versions': [ '1.0.0b1',
                                                       '0.9.9',
                                                       '0.9.8',
                                                       '0.9.7']},
                            'upstream_version': '1.0.0b1',
                            'versions': ['1.0.0b1', '0.9.9', '0.9.8', '0.9.7']},
               'project': { 'backend': 'pypi',
                            'created_on': 1412175085.0,
                            'homepage': 'https://pypi.python.org/pypi/SQLAlchemy',
                            'id': 4034,
                            'name': 'SQLAlchemy',
                            'regex': None,
                            'updated_on': 1426296430.0,
                            'version': '1.0.0b1',
                            'version_url': None,
                            'versions': ['1.0.0b1', '0.9.9', '0.9.8', '0.9.7']}},
      'msg_id': '2015-b2e3fab5-12a6-47b0-9ffc-c21d5789a2d0',
      'source_name': 'datanommer',
      'source_version': '0.6.4',
      'timestamp': 1426296431.0,
      'topic': 'org.release-monitoring.prod.anitya.project.version.update'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | anitya.project.version.update                                                                                                            |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | A new version of "SQLAlchemy" has been detected:  "1.0.0b1" newer than "0.9.9", packaged as "python-sqlalchemy and python-sqlalchemy0.5" |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://release-monitoring.org/project/4034/                                                                                             |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                                                                                              |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['projects/SQLAlchemy'])                                                                                                             |
