                           'old_updateid': None,
                           'pushed': False,
                           'release': { 'branch': None,
                                        'candidate_tag': 'f19-updates-candidate',
                                        'dist_tag': 'f19',
                                        'id_prefix': 'FEDORA',
                                        'long_name': 'Fedora 19',
                                        'name': 'F19',
                                        'override_tag': 'f19-override',
                                        'pending_stable_tag': 'f19-updates-pending',
                                        'pending_testing_tag': 'f19-updates-testing-pending',
                                        'stable_tag': 'f19-updates',
                                        'state': 'disabled',
                                        'testing_tag': 'f19-updates-testing',
                                        'version': None},
                           'request': 'testing',
                           'require_bugs': True,
                           'require_testcases': True,
                           'requirements': 'rpmlint',
                           'severity': 'unspecified',
                           'stable_karma': 3,
                           'status': 'pending',
                           'suggest': 'unspecified',
                           'title': 'tzdata-2014i-1.fc19',
                           'type': 'enhancement',
                           'unstable_karma': -3,
                           'user': { 'avatar': None,
                                     'buildroot_overrides': [],
                                     'name': 'ralph',
                                     'stacks': [ { 'description': 'This stack is so hack!',
                                                   'groups': [],
                                                   'name': 'Hackey',
                                                   'packages': [],
                                                   'requirements': 'depcheck upgradepath',
                                                   'users': [1711]}]}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-21b9ae33-3fdf-42ab-aecb-5717d0d76018',
      'timestamp': 1422302779,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.errata.publish',
      'username': 'threebean'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.errata.publish                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | This is the subject of the errata email                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/tzdata-2014i-1.fc19 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set([])                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['tzdata'])                                             |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/tzdata'])                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |0b86d273-b0ab-4f70-91ab-cde1d649dcc3-icon|                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |0b86d273-b0ab-4f70-91ab-cde1d649dcc3-secondary_icon|       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |0b86d273-b0ab-4f70-91ab-cde1d649dcc3-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |0b86d273-b0ab-4f70-91ab-cde1d649dcc3-secondary_icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/tzdata.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.masher.start
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This message is published by an admin when they send a request to
the `Bodhi2 <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_ backend, telling it
to start a mash.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.masher.start topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.masher.start>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'ralph',
               'updates': [ 'qt-creator-3.4.1-3.fc23',
                            'rakudo-star-0.0.2015.06-1.fc21',
                            'rakudo-star-0.0.2015.06-1.fc22',
                            'nqp-0.0.2015.06-1.fc21',
                            'nqp-0.0.2015.06-1.fc22',
                            'moarvm-0.2015.06-1.fc21',
                            'moarvm-0.2015.06-1.fc22',
                            'libetonyek-0.1.3-1.fc22',
                            'bind-9.10.2-2.P1.fc22,bind-dyndb-ldap-7.0-5.fc22,dnsperf-2.0.0.0-16.fc22',
                            'gap-pkg-autodoc-2015.04.29-2.fc22',
                            'hawaii-widget-styles-0.5.0-1.fc21',
                            'php-pear-PHP-CodeSniffer-2.3.3-1.fc21',
                            'php-pear-PHP-CodeSniffer-2.3.3-1.fc22',
                            'hawaii-widget-styles-0.5.0-1.fc22',
                            'MySQL-python-1.3.6-3.fc22',
                            'xdg-app-0.3.5-1.fc21',
                            'linux-firmware-20150521-53.git3161bfa4.fc22,ivtv-firmware-20080701-28',
                            'xdg-app-0.3.5-1.fc22',
                            'selinux-policy-3.13.1-105.18.fc21',
                            'dnf-plugins-core-0.1.9-1.fc22']},
      'msg_id': '2015-d370d1cd-4015-4c30-a249-792605db003f',
      'timestamp': 1439929069,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.masher.start',
      'username': 'threebean'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.masher.start                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph requested a mash of 20 updates                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | None                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['gap-pkg-autodoc', 'nqp', 'dnf-plugins-core', 'hawaii-widget-styles', 'bind', 'libetonyek', 'xdg-app', 'ivtv-firmware', 'qt-creator', 'php-pear-PHP-CodeSniffer', 'linux-firmware', 'MySQL-python', 'bind-dyndb-ldap', 'selinux-policy', 'moarvm', 'rakudo-star', 'dnsperf'])                                                                                                                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/gap-pkg-autodoc', 'packages/php-pear-PHP-CodeSniffer', 'packages/nqp', 'packages/MySQL-python', 'packages/rakudo-star', 'packages/hawaii-widget-styles', 'packages/moarvm', 'packages/selinux-policy', 'packages/libetonyek', 'packages/dnsperf', 'packages/linux-firmware', 'packages/bind', 'packages/ivtv-firmware', 'packages/dnf-plugins-core', 'packages/xdg-app', 'packages/qt-creator', 'packages/bind-dyndb-ldap']) |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |16282560-6c03-4bf8-b7df-e1014dfffa28-icon|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |16282560-6c03-4bf8-b7df-e1014dfffa28-secondary_icon|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |16282560-6c03-4bf8-b7df-e1014dfffa28-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |16282560-6c03-4bf8-b7df-e1014dfffa28-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.mashtask.complete
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The `Bodhi Masher <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_
publishes messages on this topic whenever it **finishes** its work.

Note that, these messages are broken (serverside) due to `this
issue <https://github.com/fedora-infra/fedmsg/issues/115>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.mashtask.complete topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.mashtask.complete>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'msg': { 'repo': 'test_repo', 'success': False},
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.mashtask.complete'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.mashtask.complete                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | bodhi masher failed to mash test_repo                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |cacf6644-95e3-4882-a862-b1a1661a1235-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |cacf6644-95e3-4882-a862-b1a1661a1235-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |cacf6644-95e3-4882-a862-b1a1661a1235-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |cacf6644-95e3-4882-a862-b1a1661a1235-secondary_icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.mashtask.mashing
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The `Bodhi Masher <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_
publishes messages on this topic whenever it starts mashing
a particular repository.

Note that, these messages are broken (serverside) due to `this
issue <https://github.com/fedora-infra/fedmsg/issues/115>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.mashtask.mashing topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.mashtask.mashing>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'msg': { 'repo': 'test_repo', 'updates': []},
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.mashtask.mashing'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.mashtask.mashing                                |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | bodhi masher started mashing test_repo                |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['repos/test_repo'])                              |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |05835b69-a3c0-4913-902f-22356a9c0d85-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |05835b69-a3c0-4913-902f-22356a9c0d85-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |05835b69-a3c0-4913-902f-22356a9c0d85-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |05835b69-a3c0-4913-902f-22356a9c0d85-secondary_icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.mashtask.start
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The `Bodhi Masher <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_
publishes messages on this topic whenever it **begins** its work.

Note that, these messages are broken (serverside) due to `this
issue <https://github.com/fedora-infra/fedmsg/issues/115>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.mashtask.start topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.mashtask.start>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'msg': { }, 'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.mashtask.start'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.mashtask.start                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | bodhi masher started a push                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |bf56ff95-35ab-4ab1-a032-eea7490b2001-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |bf56ff95-35ab-4ab1-a032-eea7490b2001-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |bf56ff95-35ab-4ab1-a032-eea7490b2001-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |bf56ff95-35ab-4ab1-a032-eea7490b2001-secondary_icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.mashtask.sync.done
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The `Bodhi Masher <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_
publishes messages on this topic when it finishes syncing.

Note that, these messages are broken (serverside) due to `this
issue <https://github.com/fedora-infra/fedmsg/issues/115>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.mashtask.sync.done topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.mashtask.sync.done>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'msg': { 'repo': 'test_repo'},
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.mashtask.sync.done'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.mashtask.sync.done                                             |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | bodhi masher finished waiting for test_repo to hit the master mirror |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | Unspecified                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | Unspecified                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | Unspecified                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | Unspecified                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |966b0384-c150-4195-8e91-2952ff06e571-icon|                          |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |966b0384-c150-4195-8e91-2952ff06e571-secondary_icon|                |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |966b0384-c150-4195-8e91-2952ff06e571-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |966b0384-c150-4195-8e91-2952ff06e571-secondary_icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.mashtask.sync.wait
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The `Bodhi Masher <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_
publishes messages on this topic when it begins **waiting to sync**.

Note that, these messages are broken (serverside) due to `this
issue <https://github.com/fedora-infra/fedmsg/issues/115>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.mashtask.sync.wait topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.mashtask.sync.wait>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'msg': { 'repo': 'test_repo'},
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.mashtask.sync.wait'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.mashtask.sync.wait                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | bodhi masher is waiting for test_repo to hit the master mirror |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | Unspecified                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | Unspecified                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | Unspecified                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | Unspecified                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |05aa18ff-0658-4359-b529-6a95e450daca-icon|                    |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |05aa18ff-0658-4359-b529-6a95e450daca-secondary_icon|          |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |05aa18ff-0658-4359-b529-6a95e450daca-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |05aa18ff-0658-4359-b529-6a95e450daca-secondary_icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.stack.delete
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

`Bodhi2 <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_ introduced the
concept of *stacks* of packages that can be grouped for to share
requirements.  That system publishes messages like this anytime a user
**deletes a stack**.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.stack.delete topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.stack.delete>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 2,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'ralph',
               'stack': { 'description': 'the greatest game you will ever play',
                          'groups': [],
                          'name': 'hacking',
                          'packages': [ { 'builds': [],
                                          'committers': [],
                                          'name': 'nethack',
                                          'requirements': 'depcheck upgradepath',
                                          'stack': 9,
                                          'stack_id': 9,
                                          'test_cases': []}],
                          'requirements': 'depcheck upgradepath',
                          'users': [ { 'avatar': None,
                                       'buildroot_overrides': [],
                                       'name': 'ralph',
                                       'stacks': [1, 8, 9]}]}},
      'msg_id': '2015-21b9ae33-3fdf-42ab-aecb-5717d0d76018',
      'timestamp': 1422302779,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.stack.delete',
      'username': 'threebean'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.stack.delete                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph deleted the "hacking" stack                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/stacks/hacking        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['nethack'])                                      |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/nethack', 'stacks/hacking'])           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |3b0a0a83-408e-461d-bdf4-548f8e6b62ab-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |3b0a0a83-408e-461d-bdf4-548f8e6b62ab-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |3b0a0a83-408e-461d-bdf4-548f8e6b62ab-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |3b0a0a83-408e-461d-bdf4-548f8e6b62ab-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.stack.save
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

`Bodhi2 <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_ introduced the
concept of *stacks* of packages that can be grouped for to share
requirements.  That system publishes messages like this anytime a user
**modifies or creates a new stack**.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.stack.save topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.stack.save>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 2,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'ralph',
               'stack': { 'description': 'the greatest game you will ever play',
                          'groups': [],
                          'name': 'hacking',
                          'packages': [ { 'builds': [],
                                          'committers': [],
                                          'name': 'nethack',
                                          'requirements': 'depcheck upgradepath',
                                          'stack': 9,
                                          'stack_id': 9,
                                          'test_cases': []}],
                          'requirements': 'depcheck upgradepath',
                          'users': [ { 'avatar': None,
                                       'buildroot_overrides': [],
                                       'name': 'ralph',
                                       'stacks': [1, 8, 9]}]}},
      'msg_id': '2015-21b9ae33-3fdf-42ab-aecb-5717d0d76018',
      'timestamp': 1422302779,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.stack.save',
      'username': 'threebean'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.stack.save                                      |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph updated the "hacking" stack                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/stacks/hacking        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['nethack'])                                      |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/nethack', 'stacks/hacking'])           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |93ac51d9-f9f8-4ce9-beee-2e0639e902c3-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |93ac51d9-f9f8-4ce9-beee-2e0639e902c3-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |93ac51d9-f9f8-4ce9-beee-2e0639e902c3-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |93ac51d9-f9f8-4ce9-beee-2e0639e902c3-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.update.comment
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The `Bodhi Updates System <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_
publishes messages on this topic whenever a user **comments** on a bodhi
update.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.update.comment topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.comment>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'comment': { 'anonymous': False,
                            'author': 'ralph',
                            'group': None,
                            'karma': -1,
                            'text': "Can you believe how much testing we're doing? /cc @codeblock.",
                            'timestamp': 1344344050.0,
                            'update_title': 'fedmsg-1.0-1'}},
      'timestamp': 1344344053.23372,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.comment'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.update.comment                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph commented on bodhi update fedmsg-1.0-1 (karma: -1) |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/fedmsg-1.0-1     |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                              |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph', 'codeblock'])                              |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['fedmsg'])                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/fedmsg'])                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |cc28ebbd-55fb-465e-a26a-fac4a10cc3b3-icon|              |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |cc28ebbd-55fb-465e-a26a-fac4a10cc3b3-secondary_icon|    |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+

.. |cc28ebbd-55fb-465e-a26a-fac4a10cc3b3-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |cc28ebbd-55fb-465e-a26a-fac4a10cc3b3-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.update.complete.testing
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The `Bodhi Updates System <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_
publishes messages on this topic whenever an update
**completes it's push to the testing repository**.  Here's a
straightforward example:

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.update.complete.testing topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.complete.testing>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 88,
      'msg': { 'update': { 'status': 'testing',
                           'submitter': { 'name': 'ralph'},
                           'title': 'fedmsg-0.2.7-2.el6'}},
      'timestamp': 1344447839.891876,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.complete.testing'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.update.complete.testing                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph's fedmsg-0.2.7-2.el6 bodhi update completed push to testing |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/fedmsg-0.2.7-2.el6        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['fedmsg'])                                                   |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/fedmsg'])                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |285f0252-9777-4053-b109-4ca0747f6706-icon|                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |285f0252-9777-4053-b109-4ca0747f6706-secondary_icon|             |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |285f0252-9777-4053-b109-4ca0747f6706-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |285f0252-9777-4053-b109-4ca0747f6706-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.update.edit
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

`Bodhi2 <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_ publishes
this kind of message when a package maintainer **edits a pre-existing
update**.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.update.edit topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.edit>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'msg': { 'agent': 'ralph',
               'update': { 'alias': None,
                           'bugs': [],
                           'builds': [ { 'nvr': 'tzdata-2014i-1.fc19',
                                         'override': None}],
                           'close_bugs': True,
                           'comments': [ { 'anonymous': False,
                                           'bug_feedback': [],
                                           'id': 484236,
                                           'karma': 0,
                                           'karma_critpath': 0,
                                           'testcase_feedback': [],
                                           'text': 'ralph edited this update. ',
                                           'timestamp': '2015-01-28 03:02:44',
                                           'update': 54046,
                                           'update_id': 54046,
                                           'user': { 'avatar': None,
                                                     'buildroot_overrides': [ ],
                                                     'name': 'bodhi',
                                                     'stacks': []},
                                           'user_id': 1681}],
                           'critpath': False,
                           'cves': [],
                           'date_approved': None,
                           'date_modified': '2015-01-28 03:02:55',
                           'date_pushed': None,
                           'date_submitted': '2014-10-29 20:02:57',
                           'karma': 0,
                           'locked': False,
                           'notes': 'the update notes go here...',
                           'old_updateid': None,
                           'pushed': False,
                           'release': { 'branch': None,
                                        'candidate_tag': 'f19-updates-candidate',
                                        'dist_tag': 'f19',
                                        'id_prefix': 'FEDORA',
                                        'long_name': 'Fedora 19',
                                        'name': 'F19',
                                        'override_tag': 'f19-override',
                                        'pending_stable_tag': 'f19-updates-pending',
                                        'pending_testing_tag': 'f19-updates-testing-pending',
                                        'stable_tag': 'f19-updates',
                                        'state': 'disabled',
                                        'testing_tag': 'f19-updates-testing',
                                        'version': None},
                           'request': 'testing',
                           'require_bugs': True,
                           'require_testcases': True,
                           'requirements': 'rpmlint',
                           'severity': 'unspecified',
                           'stable_karma': 3,
                           'status': 'pending',
                           'suggest': 'unspecified',
                           'title': 'tzdata-2014i-1.fc19',
                           'type': 'enhancement',
                           'unstable_karma': -3,
                           'user': { 'avatar': None,
                                     'buildroot_overrides': [],
                                     'name': 'ralph',
                                     'stacks': [ { 'description': 'This stack is so hack!',
                                                   'groups': [],
                                                   'name': 'Hackey',
                                                   'packages': [],
                                                   'requirements': 'depcheck upgradepath',
                                                   'users': [1711]}]}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-2b398e44-8012-455f-bfeb-195b9dda18f6',
      'timestamp': 1422414175,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.edit',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.update.edit                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph edited tzdata-2014i-1.fc19                            |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/tzdata-2014i-1.fc19 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                              |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['tzdata'])                                             |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/tzdata'])                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |e97b1d45-8400-46db-a557-e22356fd0363-icon|                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |e97b1d45-8400-46db-a557-e22356fd0363-secondary_icon|       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |e97b1d45-8400-46db-a557-e22356fd0363-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |e97b1d45-8400-46db-a557-e22356fd0363-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.update.eject
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The `Bodhi Updates System <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_
publishes messages on this topic whenever an update
**is ejected from the mash** due to some failure:

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.update.eject topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.eject>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 88,
      'msg': { 'reason': 'some reason',
               'release': { 'dist_tag': 'el6',
                            'locked': True,
                            'long_name': 'Fedora EPEL 6',
                            'name': 'EL6'},
               'repo': 'test_repo',
               'request': 'testing',
               'update': { 'status': 'testing',
                           'submitter': { 'name': 'ralph'},
                           'title': 'fedmsg-0.2.7-2.el6'}},
      'timestamp': 1344447839.891876,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.eject'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.update.eject                                                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph's fedmsg-0.2.7-2.el6 bodhi update was ejected from the test_repo mash.  Reason: "some reason" |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/fedmsg-0.2.7-2.el6                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                                                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                                                                      |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['fedmsg'])                                                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/fedmsg'])                                                                            |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |2ae2d1bc-ce7c-4b10-b5a9-2a30f2153f87-icon|                                                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |2ae2d1bc-ce7c-4b10-b5a9-2a30f2153f87-secondary_icon|                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |2ae2d1bc-ce7c-4b10-b5a9-2a30f2153f87-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |2ae2d1bc-ce7c-4b10-b5a9-2a30f2153f87-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.update.karma.threshold
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

`Bodhi2 <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_ publishes these
messages when an update reaches the stable or unstable karma thresholds.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.update.karma.threshold topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.karma.threshold>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 2,
      'msg': { 'status': 'stable',
               'update': { 'alias': 'FEDORA-EPEL-2015-0238',
                           'bugs': [],
                           'builds': [ { 'nvr': 'tzdata-2014i-1.fc19',
                                         'override': None}],
                           'close_bugs': True,
                           'comments': [ { 'anonymous': False,
                                           'bug_feedback': [],
                                           'id': 484236,
                                           'karma': 0,
                                           'karma_critpath': 0,
                                           'testcase_feedback': [],
                                           'text': 'ralph edited this update. ',
                                           'timestamp': '2015-01-28 03:02:44',
                                           'update': 54046,
                                           'update_id': 54046,
                                           'user': { 'avatar': None,
                                                     'buildroot_overrides': [ ],
                                                     'name': 'bodhi',
                                                     'stacks': []},
                                           'user_id': 1681}],
                           'critpath': False,
                           'cves': [],
                           'date_approved': None,
                           'date_modified': '2015-01-28 03:02:55',
                           'date_pushed': None,
                           'date_submitted': '2014-10-29 20:02:57',
                           'karma': 0,
                           'locked': False,
                           'notes': 'the update notes go here...',
                           'old_updateid': None,
                           'pushed': False,
                           'release': { 'branch': None,
                                        'candidate_tag': 'f19-updates-candidate',
                                        'dist_tag': 'f19',
                                        'id_prefix': 'FEDORA',
                                        'long_name': 'Fedora 19',
                                        'name': 'F19',
                                        'override_tag': 'f19-override',
                                        'pending_stable_tag': 'f19-updates-pending',
                                        'pending_testing_tag': 'f19-updates-testing-pending',
                                        'stable_tag': 'f19-updates',
                                        'state': 'disabled',
                                        'testing_tag': 'f19-updates-testing',
                                        'version': None},
                           'request': 'testing',
                           'require_bugs': True,
                           'require_testcases': True,
                           'requirements': 'rpmlint',
                           'severity': 'unspecified',
                           'stable_karma': 3,
                           'status': 'pending',
                           'suggest': 'unspecified',
                           'title': 'tzdata-2014i-1.fc19',
                           'type': 'enhancement',
                           'unstable_karma': -3,
                           'user': { 'avatar': None,
                                     'buildroot_overrides': [],
                                     'name': 'ralph',
                                     'stacks': [ { 'description': 'This stack is so hack!',
                                                   'groups': [],
                                                   'name': 'Hackey',
                                                   'packages': [],
                                                   'requirements': 'depcheck upgradepath',
                                                   'users': [1711]}]}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-21b9ae33-3fdf-42ab-aecb-5717d0d76018',
      'timestamp': 1422302779,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.karma.threshold',
      'username': 'threebean'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.update.karma.threshold                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | tzdata-2014i-1.fc19 reached the stable karma threshold        |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2015-0238 |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                   |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set([])                                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['tzdata'])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/tzdata'])                                      |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |70e59cff-2cb6-4503-afae-dbef7431552f-icon|                   |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |70e59cff-2cb6-4503-afae-dbef7431552f-secondary_icon|         |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |70e59cff-2cb6-4503-afae-dbef7431552f-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |70e59cff-2cb6-4503-afae-dbef7431552f-secondary_icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/tzdata.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.update.request.obsolete
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The `Bodhi Updates System <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_
publishes messages on this topic whenever a *user* requests that an update
be **obsoleted**.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.update.request.obsolete topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.request.obsolete>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'msg': { 'agent': 'lmacken',
               'update': { 'submitter': 'lmacken', 'title': 'foo'}},
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.request.obsolete'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.update.request.obsolete                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | lmacken obsoleted foo                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/foo           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['lmacken'])                                      |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['foo'])                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/foo'])                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |b426dd75-47f3-46b1-8b88-9ecb020ad065-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |b426dd75-47f3-46b1-8b88-9ecb020ad065-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |b426dd75-47f3-46b1-8b88-9ecb020ad065-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |b426dd75-47f3-46b1-8b88-9ecb020ad065-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/203f6cb95b44b5d38aa21425b066dd522d3e19d8919cf4b339f29e0ea7f03e9b?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.update.request.revoke
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The `Bodhi Updates System <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_
publishes messages on this topic whenever a *user* revokes a prior
request on an update.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.update.request.revoke topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.request.revoke>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'msg': { 'agent': 'lmacken',
               'update': { 'submitter': 'lmacken', 'title': 'foo'}},
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.request.revoke'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.update.request.revoke                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | lmacken revoked foo                                   |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/foo           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['lmacken'])                                      |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['foo'])                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/foo'])                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |907b659e-e937-436e-9a9d-0a26abe579df-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |907b659e-e937-436e-9a9d-0a26abe579df-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |907b659e-e937-436e-9a9d-0a26abe579df-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |907b659e-e937-436e-9a9d-0a26abe579df-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/203f6cb95b44b5d38aa21425b066dd522d3e19d8919cf4b339f29e0ea7f03e9b?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.update.request.stable
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The `Bodhi Updates System <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_
publishes messages on this topic whenever a *user* requests that an update
be marked as **stable**.

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.update.request.stable topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.request.stable>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'msg': { 'agent': 'lmacken',
               'update': { 'submitter': 'lmacken', 'title': 'foo'}},
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.request.stable'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | bodhi.update.request.stable                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | lmacken submitted foo to stable                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/foo           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['lmacken'])                                      |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['foo'])                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/foo'])                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |0d7b6749-b6c0-438b-bf38-699c2c365d3a-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |0d7b6749-b6c0-438b-bf38-699c2c365d3a-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |0d7b6749-b6c0-438b-bf38-699c2c365d3a-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/bodhi.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |0d7b6749-b6c0-438b-bf38-699c2c365d3a-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/203f6cb95b44b5d38aa21425b066dd522d3e19d8919cf4b339f29e0ea7f03e9b?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



bodhi.update.request.testing
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The `Bodhi Updates System <https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org>`_
publishes messages on this topic whenever a *user* requests that an update
be pushed to the testing repository. Some updates may contain *multiple
packages*, which can be a little tricky if you're not ready for it.  Here's
an example of that:

You can view the history of `messages with the bodhi.update.request.testing topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.request.testing>`_ or `all bodhi messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=bodhi>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 2,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'lmacken',
               'update': { 'approved': None,
                           'bugs': [],
                           'builds': [ { 'nvr': 'gnome-settings-daemon-3.6.1-1.fc18',
                                         'package': { 'committers': [ 'hadess',
                                                                      'ofourdan',
                                                                      'mkasik',
                                                                      'cosimoc'],
                                                      'name': 'gnome-settings-daemon',
                                                      'suggest_reboot': False}},
                                       { 'nvr': 'control-center-3.6.1-1.fc18',
                                         'package': { 'committers': [ 'ctrl-center-team',
                                                                      'ofourdan',
                                                                      'ssp',
                                                                      'ajax',
                                                                      'alexl',
                                                                      'jrb',
                                                                      'mbarnes',
                                                                      'caolanm',
                                                                      'davidz',
                                                                      'mclasen',
                                                                      'rhughes',
                                                                      'hadess',
                                                                      'johnp',
                                                                      'caillon',
                                                                      'whot',
                                                                      'rstrode'],
                                                      'name': 'control-center',
                                                      'suggest_reboot': False}}],
                           'close_bugs': True,
                           'comments': [ { 'anonymous': False,
                                           'author': 'bodhi',
                                           'group': None,
                                           'karma': 0,
                                           'text': 'This update has been submitted for testing by hadess. ',
                                           'timestamp': 1349718539.0,
                                           'update_title': 'gnome-settings-daemon-3.6.1-1.fc18,control-center-3.6.1-1.fc18'}],
                           'critpath': False,
                           'critpath_approved': False,
                           'date_modified': None,
                           'date_pushed': None,
                           'date_submitted': 1349718534.0,
                           'karma': 0,
                           'nagged': None,
                           'notes': "This update fixes numerous bugs in the new Input Sources support, the Network panel and adds a help screen accessible via Wacom tablets's buttons.",
                           'release': { 'dist_tag': 'f18',
                                        'id_prefix': 'FEDORA',
                                        'locked': True,
                                        'long_name': 'Fedora 18',
                                        'name': 'F18'},
                           'request': 'testing',
                           'stable_karma': 3,
                           'status': 'pending',
                           'submitter': 'hadess',
                           'title': 'gnome-settings-daemon-3.6.1-1.fc18,control-center-3.6.1-1.fc18',
                           'type': 'bugfix',
                           'unstable_karma': -3,
                           'updateid': None}},
      'timestamp': 1349718539.0,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.bodhi.update.request.testing'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:
