fedocal.meeting.delete
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone deletes a meeting from
`fedocal <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/calendar>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the fedocal.meeting.delete topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedocal.meeting.delete>`_ or `all fedocal messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedocal>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'ralph',
               'calendar': { 'calendar_admin_group': 'sysadmin-badges',
                             'calendar_contact': 'ralph@fedoraproject.org',
                             'calendar_description': 'cool deal',
                             'calendar_editor_group': 'sysadmin-main',
                             'calendar_name': 'awesome',
                             'calendar_status': 'Enabled'},
               'meeting': { 'calendar_name': 'awesome',
                            'meeting_date': '2013-09-20',
                            'meeting_date_end': '2013-09-21',
                            'meeting_id': 42,
                            'meeting_information': 'awesome',
                            'meeting_manager': 'ralph,',
                            'meeting_name': 'wat',
                            'meeting_region': None,
                            'meeting_time_start': '12:00:00',
                            'meeting_time_stop': '12:00:00',
                            'meeting_timezone': 'UTC'}},
      'msg_id': '2013-8d60e263-5c5f-40bb-86e0-241dc3965ba4',
      'timestamp': 1379638613.767245,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedocal.meeting.delete',
      'username': 'threebean'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fedocal.meeting.delete                                      |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph deleted the "wat" meeting from the "awesome" calendar |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/calendar/meeting/42/         |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                              |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['awesome/meetings/wat/delete'])                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |58b36485-ad64-4012-b9f4-4edabbb014b0-icon|                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |58b36485-ad64-4012-b9f4-4edabbb014b0-secondary_icon|       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |58b36485-ad64-4012-b9f4-4edabbb014b0-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/calendar/static/calendar.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |58b36485-ad64-4012-b9f4-4edabbb014b0-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px

   :width: 32px



fedocal.meeting.reminder
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published by a cronjob when time gets close to
certain meetings scheduled in the `fedocal
<https://apps.fedoraproject.org/calendar>`_ calendaring system.

You can view the history of `messages with the fedocal.meeting.reminder topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedocal.meeting.reminder>`_ or `all fedocal messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedocal>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'calendar': { 'calendar_admin_group': 'sysadmin-badges',
                             'calendar_contact': 'ralph@fedoraproject.org',
                             'calendar_description': 'cool deal',
                             'calendar_editor_group': 'sysadmin-main',
                             'calendar_name': 'awesome',
                             'calendar_status': 'Enabled'},
               'meeting': { 'calendar_name': 'awesome',
                            'meeting_date': '2015-10-24',
                            'meeting_date_end': '2013-09-21',
                            'meeting_id': 42,
                            'meeting_information': 'awesome',
                            'meeting_manager': 'ralph,',
                            'meeting_name': 'wat',
                            'meeting_region': None,
                            'meeting_time_start': '22:54:01',
                            'meeting_time_stop': '12:00:00',
                            'meeting_timezone': 'UTC'}},
      'msg_id': '2013-8d60e263-5c5f-40bb-86e0-241dc3965ba4',
      'timestamp': 1379638613.767245,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedocal.meeting.reminder',
      'username': 'threebean'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fedocal.meeting.reminder                            |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | Unspecified                                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/calendar/meeting/42/ |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set([])                                             |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                             |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['awesome/meetings/wat/reminder'])              |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |8aa0f24d-b8a9-4aa2-b7c5-dbf4af0174d6-icon|         |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | Unspecified                                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+

.. |8aa0f24d-b8a9-4aa2-b7c5-dbf4af0174d6-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/calendar/static/calendar.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fedocal.meeting.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone updates a meeting from
`fedocal <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/calendar>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the fedocal.meeting.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedocal.meeting.update>`_ or `all fedocal messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedocal>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'ralph',
               'calendar': { 'calendar_admin_group': 'sysadmin-badges',
                             'calendar_contact': 'ralph@fedoraproject.org',
                             'calendar_description': 'cool deal',
                             'calendar_editor_group': 'sysadmin-main',
                             'calendar_name': 'awesome',
                             'calendar_status': 'Enabled'},
               'meeting': { 'calendar_name': 'awesome',
                            'meeting_date': '2013-09-20',
                            'meeting_date_end': '2013-09-21',
                            'meeting_id': 42,
                            'meeting_information': 'awesome',
                            'meeting_manager': 'ralph,',
                            'meeting_name': 'wat',
                            'meeting_region': None,
                            'meeting_time_start': '12:00:00',
                            'meeting_time_stop': '12:00:00',
                            'meeting_timezone': 'UTC'}},
      'msg_id': '2013-8d60e263-5c5f-40bb-86e0-241dc3965ba4',
      'timestamp': 1379638613.767245,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedocal.meeting.update',
      'username': 'threebean'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fedocal.meeting.update                                      |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph updated the "wat" meeting from the "awesome" calendar |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/calendar/meeting/42/         |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                              |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['awesome/meetings/wat/update'])                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |adf09ab5-06ef-43d1-b469-b290ae7aae3b-icon|                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |adf09ab5-06ef-43d1-b469-b290ae7aae3b-secondary_icon|       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |adf09ab5-06ef-43d1-b469-b290ae7aae3b-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/calendar/static/calendar.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |adf09ab5-06ef-43d1-b469-b290ae7aae3b-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fedora_elections
----------------

fedora_elections.candidate.delete
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone add a candidate to an
elections in `elections <https://admin.fedoraproject.org/voting/>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the fedora_elections.candidate.delete topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedora_elections.candidate.delete>`_ or `all fedora_elections messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedora_elections>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'candidate': { 'name': 'Toshio', 'url': ''},
               'election': { 'alias': 'test',
                             'description': 'test desc',
                             'embargoed': 1,
                             'end_date': 1397080800.0,
                             'shortdesc': 'test',
                             'start_date': 1396994400.0,
                             'url': 'http: //giuakle.org',
                             'voting_type': 'range'}},
      'msg_id': '2013-96f9ca0e-c7c6-43f0-9de7-7a268c7f1cef',
      'timestamp': 1379638157.759283,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedora_elections.candidate.delete',
      'username': 'pingou'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fedora_elections.candidate.delete                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou deleted candidate "Toshio" of election "test"  |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://admin.fedoraproject.org/voting/about/test     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['test/candidate/delete'])                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |712ed0ba-af4d-4d84-9f90-37c2b1406757-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |712ed0ba-af4d-4d84-9f90-37c2b1406757-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |712ed0ba-af4d-4d84-9f90-37c2b1406757-icon| image:: None
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |712ed0ba-af4d-4d84-9f90-37c2b1406757-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fedora_elections.candidate.edit
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone edited a candidate of an
elections in `elections <https://admin.fedoraproject.org/voting/>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the fedora_elections.candidate.edit topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedora_elections.candidate.edit>`_ or `all fedora_elections messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedora_elections>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'candidate': { 'name': 'Toshio', 'url': ''},
               'election': { 'alias': 'test',
                             'description': 'test desc',
                             'embargoed': 1,
                             'end_date': 1397080800.0,
                             'shortdesc': 'test',
                             'start_date': 1396994400.0,
                             'url': 'http: //giuakle.org',
                             'voting_type': 'range'}},
      'msg_id': '2013-96f9ca0e-c7c6-43f0-9de7-7a268c7f1cef',
      'timestamp': 1379638157.759283,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedora_elections.candidate.edit',
      'username': 'pingou'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fedora_elections.candidate.edit                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou edited candidate "Toshio" of election "test"   |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://admin.fedoraproject.org/voting/about/test     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['test/candidate/edit'])                          |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |32b6a4c0-5664-4694-bca9-62e3b809d49d-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |32b6a4c0-5664-4694-bca9-62e3b809d49d-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |32b6a4c0-5664-4694-bca9-62e3b809d49d-icon| image:: None
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |32b6a4c0-5664-4694-bca9-62e3b809d49d-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fedora_elections.candidate.new
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone added a candidate to an
elections in `elections <https://admin.fedoraproject.org/voting/>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the fedora_elections.candidate.new topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedora_elections.candidate.new>`_ or `all fedora_elections messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedora_elections>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'candidate': { 'name': 'Toshio', 'url': ''},
               'election': { 'alias': 'test',
                             'description': 'test desc',
                             'embargoed': 1,
                             'end_date': 1397080800.0,
                             'shortdesc': 'test',
                             'start_date': 1396994400.0,
                             'url': 'http: //giuakle.org',
                             'voting_type': 'range'}},
      'msg_id': '2013-96f9ca0e-c7c6-43f0-9de7-7a268c7f1cef',
      'timestamp': 1379638157.759283,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedora_elections.candidate.new',
      'username': 'pingou'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fedora_elections.candidate.new                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou added candidate "Toshio" to election "test"    |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://admin.fedoraproject.org/voting/about/test     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['test/candidate/new'])                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |e80ebde1-9433-4d22-9f58-59f439461823-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |e80ebde1-9433-4d22-9f58-59f439461823-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |e80ebde1-9433-4d22-9f58-59f439461823-icon| image:: None
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |e80ebde1-9433-4d22-9f58-59f439461823-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fedora_elections.election.edit
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone edit an elections in
`elections <https://admin.fedoraproject.org/voting/>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the fedora_elections.election.edit topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedora_elections.election.edit>`_ or `all fedora_elections messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedora_elections>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'election': { 'alias': 'test',
                             'description': 'test desc',
                             'embargoed': 1,
                             'end_date': 1397080800.0,
                             'shortdesc': 'test',
                             'start_date': 1396994400.0,
                             'url': 'http: //giuakle.org',
                             'voting_type': 'range'}},
      'msg_id': '2013-96f9ca0e-c7c6-43f0-9de7-7a268c7f1cef',
      'timestamp': 1379638157.759283,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedora_elections.election.edit',
      'username': 'pingou'}

| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou edited election "test"                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://admin.fedoraproject.org/voting/about/test     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

fedora_elections.election.new
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when someone creates a new elections
in `elections <https://admin.fedoraproject.org/voting/>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the fedora_elections.election.new topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedora_elections.election.new>`_ or `all fedora_elections messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedora_elections>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 2,
      'msg': { 'admin_groups': [],
               'alias': 'council-nov14',
               'candidates': [],
               'candidates_are_fasusers': 1,
               'description': 'The Fedora Council is our top-level community ...',
               'embargoed': 1,
               'end_date': 1417046399.0,
               'fas_user': 'jreznik',
               'id': 65,
               'legal_voters': [ { 'election': 65,
                                   'election_id': 65,
                                   'group_name': 'anycla',
                                   'id': 67}],
               'max_votes': None,
               'seats_elected': 2,
               'shortdesc': 'Council - November 2014',
               'start_date': 1416268800.0,
               'url': 'http://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Council/Nominations',
               'votes': [],
               'voting_type': 'range'},
      'msg_id': '2014-6a4e287c-a65f-488f-8ba7-5b454a50642c',
      'source_name': 'datanommer',
      'source_version': '0.6.4',
      'timestamp': 1416208425.0,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedora_elections.election.new'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fedora_elections.election.new                              |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | jreznik created election "council-nov14"                   |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://admin.fedoraproject.org/voting/about/council-nov14 |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['jreznik'])                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['council-nov14/election/new'])                        |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |5ee11b7c-8b27-49c2-a2b3-71ddf505a134-icon|                |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |5ee11b7c-8b27-49c2-a2b3-71ddf505a134-secondary_icon|      |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |5ee11b7c-8b27-49c2-a2b3-71ddf505a134-icon| image:: None
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |5ee11b7c-8b27-49c2-a2b3-71ddf505a134-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/6a345b20c10f890075dab7cc5ac70fdc93167bfd40a4f9299bc77f5a0238a5cc?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fedoratagger
------------

fedoratagger.rating.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

`Fedora Tagger <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/tagger>`_
doesn't just do tagging of packages, in new versions it also
allows users to rate packages.  It publishes messages like this
one when an anonymous user updates their rating of a package.

You can view the history of `messages with the fedoratagger.rating.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedoratagger.rating.update>`_ or `all fedoratagger messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedoratagger>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'rating': { 'package': { 'icon': 'https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png',
                                        'name': 'nethack',
                                        'rating': 15.0,
                                        'summary': '',
                                        'tags': [ { 'dislike': 0,
                                                    'like': 1,
                                                    'package': 'nethack',
                                                    'tag': 'awesome',
                                                    'total': 1,
                                                    'votes': 1}]},
                           'rating': 15,
                           'user': { 'anonymous': True,
                                     'rank': -1,
                                     'username': 'anonymous',
                                     'votes': 0}}},
      'timestamp': 1365514895.61764,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedoratagger.rating.update',
      'username': 'threebean'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fedoratagger.rating.update                    |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | An anonymous user gave nethack a rating of 15 |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/tagger/nethack |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                   |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set([])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['nethack'])                              |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/nethack'])                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |a3a4e68c-5a8a-4f35-9ebe-ba986740bdba-icon|   |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | Unspecified                                   |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+

.. |a3a4e68c-5a8a-4f35-9ebe-ba986740bdba-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/tagger.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fedoratagger.tag.create
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

`Fedora Tagger <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/tagger>`_
publishes messages like this one when a user **creates** a new tag.

You can view the history of `messages with the fedoratagger.tag.create topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedoratagger.tag.create>`_ or `all fedoratagger messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedoratagger>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 2,
      'msg': { 'tag': { 'dislike': 0,
                        'like': 1,
                        'package': 'mattd',
                        'tag': 'awesome',
                        'total': 1,
                        'votes': 1},
               'user': { 'anonymous': False,
                         'rank': -1,
                         'username': 'ralph',
                         'votes': 4},
               'vote': { 'like': True,
                         'tag': { 'dislike': 0,
                                  'like': 1,
                                  'package': 'mattd',
                                  'tag': 'awesome',
                                  'total': 1,
                                  'votes': 1},
                         'user': { 'anonymous': False,
                                   'rank': -1,
                                   'username': 'ralph',
                                   'votes': 4}}},
      'timestamp': 1365444411.924043,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedoratagger.tag.create',
      'username': 'threebean'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fedoratagger.tag.create                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph added tag "awesome" to mattd                    |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/tagger/mattd           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['mattd'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['labels/awesome', 'packages/mattd'])             |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |6b9ba7ae-ed0f-40f0-a30e-d8cd17df3a26-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |6b9ba7ae-ed0f-40f0-a30e-d8cd17df3a26-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |6b9ba7ae-ed0f-40f0-a30e-d8cd17df3a26-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/tagger.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |6b9ba7ae-ed0f-40f0-a30e-d8cd17df3a26-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fedoratagger.tag.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

`Fedora Tagger <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/tagger>`_
publishes messages like this one when a user votes on a tag.
Users may upvote or downvote a tag and they may do so either
anonymously or authenticated.  Here's an example of an
authenticated downvote:

You can view the history of `messages with the fedoratagger.tag.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedoratagger.tag.update>`_ or `all fedoratagger messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedoratagger>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 3,
      'msg': { 'tag': { 'dislike': 1,
                        'like': 0,
                        'package': 'mattd',
                        'tag': 'stupid',
                        'total': -1,
                        'votes': 1},
               'user': { 'anonymous': False,
                         'rank': -1,
                         'username': 'ralph',
                         'votes': 4},
               'vote': { 'like': False,
                         'tag': { 'dislike': 1,
                                  'like': 0,
                                  'package': 'mattd',
                                  'tag': 'stupid',
                                  'total': -1,
                                  'votes': 1},
                         'user': { 'anonymous': False,
                                   'rank': -1,
                                   'username': 'ralph',
                                   'votes': 4}}},
      'timestamp': 1365444503.627384,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedoratagger.tag.update',
      'username': 'threebean'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fedoratagger.tag.update                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph downvoted "stupid" on mattd                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/tagger/mattd           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['mattd'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['labels/stupid', 'packages/mattd'])              |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |577ed027-4a21-43c0-8e48-37f5c9d37d9a-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |577ed027-4a21-43c0-8e48-37f5c9d37d9a-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |577ed027-4a21-43c0-8e48-37f5c9d37d9a-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/tagger.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |577ed027-4a21-43c0-8e48-37f5c9d37d9a-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fedoratagger.usage.toggle
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

`Fedora Tagger <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/tagger>`_
publishes messages like this one when a user **toggles** their usage status
for a package.

Here is an example of ralph declaring that he *no longer* uses *passwd*.

You can view the history of `messages with the fedoratagger.usage.toggle topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedoratagger.usage.toggle>`_ or `all fedoratagger messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedoratagger>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'package': { 'icon': 'https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png',
                            'name': 'passwd',
                            'rating': -1.0,
                            'summary': 'An utility for setting or changing passwords',
                            'tags': [],
                            'usage': 0},
               'usage': False,
               'user': { 'anonymous': False,
                         'rank': 6,
                         'score': 949,
                         'username': 'ralph',
                         'votes': 859}},
      'msg_id': '2014-8b4ffffc-4854-4da5-92b1-d266b4e7f52f',
      'timestamp': 1391107443,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedoratagger.usage.toggle',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fedoratagger.usage.toggle                             |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph declared that they no longer use passwd         |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/tagger/passwd          |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['passwd'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/passwd'])                              |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |bee6b920-8ab5-4efa-9c78-146dace47e5b-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |bee6b920-8ab5-4efa-9c78-146dace47e5b-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |bee6b920-8ab5-4efa-9c78-146dace47e5b-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/tagger.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |bee6b920-8ab5-4efa-9c78-146dace47e5b-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fedoratagger.usage.toggle
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

`Fedora Tagger <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/tagger>`_
publishes messages like this one when a user **toggles** their usage status
for a package.

Here is an example of ralph declaring that he uses *passwd*.

You can view the history of `messages with the fedoratagger.usage.toggle topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedoratagger.usage.toggle>`_ or `all fedoratagger messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedoratagger>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'package': { 'icon': 'https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png',
                            'name': 'passwd',
                            'rating': -1.0,
                            'summary': 'An utility for setting or changing passwords',
                            'tags': [],
                            'usage': 1},
               'usage': True,
               'user': { 'anonymous': False,
                         'rank': 6,
                         'score': 949,
                         'username': 'ralph',
                         'votes': 859}},
      'msg_id': '2014-8b4ffffc-4854-4da5-92b1-d266b4e7f52f',
      'timestamp': 1391107443,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedoratagger.usage.toggle',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fedoratagger.usage.toggle                             |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph declared that they use passwd                   |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/tagger/passwd          |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set(['passwd'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['packages/passwd'])                              |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |65ae13a9-af4e-4b2a-8025-1418e00b068b-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |65ae13a9-af4e-4b2a-8025-1418e00b068b-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |65ae13a9-af4e-4b2a-8025-1418e00b068b-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/tagger.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |65ae13a9-af4e-4b2a-8025-1418e00b068b-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fedoratagger.user.rank.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

`Fedora Tagger <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/tagger>`_
publishes messages like this one when a user's rank on the Fedora Tagger
leaderboard changes.

You can view the history of `messages with the fedoratagger.user.rank.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fedoratagger.user.rank.update>`_ or `all fedoratagger messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fedoratagger>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'user': { 'anonymous': False,
                         'rank': 59,
                         'score': 275,
                         'username': 'immanetize',
                         'votes': 176}},
      'msg_id': '2014-3893d29a-e9a1-43e0-90f0-333feebb766c',
      'source_name': 'datanommer',
      'source_version': '0.6.1',
      'timestamp': 1396074860.0,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fedoratagger.user.rank.update'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fedoratagger.user.rank.update                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | immanetize's rank changed to 59                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['immanetize'])                                   |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |7f95f869-4f0a-474f-ba04-fd3b5204b357-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |7f95f869-4f0a-474f-ba04-fd3b5204b357-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |7f95f869-4f0a-474f-ba04-fd3b5204b357-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/tagger.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |7f95f869-4f0a-474f-ba04-fd3b5204b357-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/75aba49c572a4319af1792ba0dbe2a0d80de4dc1f602c43a360d9b0fc347ae0f?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fmn
---

fmn.confirmation.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Messages of this type are published whenever **the status of a
confirmation changes** in the `Fedora Notifications
<https://apps.fedoraproject.org/notifications>`_ app.

You can view the history of `messages with the fmn.confirmation.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.confirmation.update>`_ or `all fmn messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fmn>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'changed': 'status',
               'context': 'irc',
               'openid': 'ralph.id.fedoraproject.org'},
      'msg_id': '2013-96f9ca0e-c7c6-43f0-9de7-7a268c7f1cef',
      'timestamp': 1379638157.759283,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.confirmation.update',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fmn.confirmation.update                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | the status of one of ralph's pending confirmations changed |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/notifications/              |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                             |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['ralph/irc/confirmation/status'])                     |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |e1ce6bab-135d-4ed9-b1fd-152ead6f0440-icon|                |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |e1ce6bab-135d-4ed9-b1fd-152ead6f0440-secondary_icon|      |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |e1ce6bab-135d-4ed9-b1fd-152ead6f0440-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/fedmsg.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |e1ce6bab-135d-4ed9-b1fd-152ead6f0440-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fmn.confirmation.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Messages of this type are published whenever **a confirmation value
changes** in the `Fedora Notifications
<https://apps.fedoraproject.org/notifications>`_ app.

You can view the history of `messages with the fmn.confirmation.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.confirmation.update>`_ or `all fmn messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fmn>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'changed': 'value',
               'context': 'irc',
               'openid': 'ralph.id.fedoraproject.org'},
      'msg_id': '2013-96f9ca0e-c7c6-43f0-9de7-7a268c7f1cef',
      'timestamp': 1379638157.759283,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.confirmation.update',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fmn.confirmation.update                                   |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | the value of one of ralph's pending confirmations changed |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/notifications/             |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                            |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                   |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['ralph/irc/confirmation/value'])                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |6770553c-d474-4f42-a6f9-7e5780ab42b1-icon|               |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |6770553c-d474-4f42-a6f9-7e5780ab42b1-secondary_icon|     |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+

.. |6770553c-d474-4f42-a6f9-7e5780ab42b1-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/fedmsg.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |6770553c-d474-4f42-a6f9-7e5780ab42b1-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fmn.filter.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Messages of this type are published whenever someone **updates
one of their notification rules** in the `Fedora Notifications
<https://apps.fedoraproject.org/notifications>`_ app.

You can view the history of `messages with the fmn.filter.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.filter.update>`_ or `all fmn messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fmn>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'changed': 'rules',
               'context': 'irc',
               'openid': 'ralph.id.fedoraproject.org'},
      'msg_id': '2013-96f9ca0e-c7c6-43f0-9de7-7a268c7f1cef',
      'timestamp': 1379638157.759283,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.filter.update',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fmn.filter.update                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph updated the rules on a fmn irc filter           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/notifications/         |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['ralph/irc/filter/rules'])                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |0cd28627-e511-4801-be45-bac7d26691ea-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |0cd28627-e511-4801-be45-bac7d26691ea-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |0cd28627-e511-4801-be45-bac7d26691ea-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/fedmsg.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |0cd28627-e511-4801-be45-bac7d26691ea-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fmn.preference.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Messages of this type are published whenever someone **updates
their batch values** in the `Fedora Notifications
<https://apps.fedoraproject.org/notifications>`_ app.

Batch values are the parameters used to determine how to send notification
digests like "how many messages should we accumulate before forwarding them
to you" or "how many days should we wait before forwarding you a digest".

You can view the history of `messages with the fmn.preference.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.preference.update>`_ or `all fmn messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fmn>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'changed': 'batch_values',
               'context': 'email',
               'openid': 'ralph.id.fedoraproject.org'},
      'msg_id': '2013-96f9ca0e-c7c6-43f0-9de7-7a268c7f1cef',
      'timestamp': 1379638157.759283,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.preference.update',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fmn.preference.update                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph updated their email digest options              |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/notifications/         |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['ralph/email/preference/batch_values'])          |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |9cce7e7e-0079-43e4-a646-b75ca21441df-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |9cce7e7e-0079-43e4-a646-b75ca21441df-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |9cce7e7e-0079-43e4-a646-b75ca21441df-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/fedmsg.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |9cce7e7e-0079-43e4-a646-b75ca21441df-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fmn.preference.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Messages of this type are published whenever someone **updates
their delivery details** in the `Fedora Notifications
<https://apps.fedoraproject.org/notifications>`_ app.

Delivery details are the values used to figure out how to deliver messages,
like "email address" or "irc nick".

You can view the history of `messages with the fmn.preference.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.preference.update>`_ or `all fmn messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fmn>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'changed': 'details',
               'context': 'email',
               'openid': 'ralph.id.fedoraproject.org'},
      'msg_id': '2013-96f9ca0e-c7c6-43f0-9de7-7a268c7f1cef',
      'timestamp': 1379638157.759283,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.preference.update',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fmn.preference.update                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph updated their email delivery details            |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/notifications/         |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['ralph/email/preference/details'])               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |1332cc0a-d9a8-4b35-a252-beabdb0259f5-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |1332cc0a-d9a8-4b35-a252-beabdb0259f5-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |1332cc0a-d9a8-4b35-a252-beabdb0259f5-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/fedmsg.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |1332cc0a-d9a8-4b35-a252-beabdb0259f5-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fmn.preference.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Messages of this type are published whenever someone **toggles
delivery of messages** in the `Fedora Notifications
<https://apps.fedoraproject.org/notifications>`_ app.

You can view the history of `messages with the fmn.preference.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.preference.update>`_ or `all fmn messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fmn>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'changed': 'enabled',
               'context': 'android',
               'openid': 'ralph.id.fedoraproject.org'},
      'msg_id': '2013-96f9ca0e-c7c6-43f0-9de7-7a268c7f1cef',
      'timestamp': 1379638157.759283,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.preference.update',
      'username': 'apache'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | fmn.preference.update                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ralph toggled their flow of android messages          |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://apps.fedoraproject.org/notifications/         |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['ralph'])                                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['ralph/android/preference/enabled'])             |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |b262bbf6-a16e-43cc-91b1-d805ec0ee38a-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |b262bbf6-a16e-43cc-91b1-d805ec0ee38a-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |b262bbf6-a16e-43cc-91b1-d805ec0ee38a-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/img/icons/fedmsg.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |b262bbf6-a16e-43cc-91b1-d805ec0ee38a-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/9c9f7784935381befc302fe3c814f9136e7a33953d0318761669b8643f4df55c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



fmn.preference.update
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Messages of this type are published whenever someone **toggles
delivery of messages** in the `Fedora Notifications
<https://apps.fedoraproject.org/notifications>`_ app.

You can view the history of `messages with the fmn.preference.update topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.preference.update>`_ or `all fmn messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=fmn>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'changed': 'filters',
               'context': 'irc',
               'openid': 'ralph.id.fedoraproject.org'},
      'msg_id': '2013-96f9ca0e-c7c6-43f0-9de7-7a268c7f1cef',
      'timestamp': 1379638157.759283,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.fmn.preference.update',

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
