| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |b32a3122-554a-4125-a4a0-13e0de262905-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |b32a3122-554a-4125-a4a0-13e0de262905-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |b32a3122-554a-4125-a4a0-13e0de262905-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |b32a3122-554a-4125-a4a0-13e0de262905-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.issue.tag.added
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a someone adds a tag on a ticket
opened against a project on `pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.issue.tag.added topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.issue.tag.added>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 4,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'issue': { 'blocks': '',
                          'comments': [],
                          'content': 'report',
                          'date_created': '1427442217',
                          'depends': '',
                          'id': 4,
                          'private': False,
                          'status': 'Open',
                          'tags': [],
                          'title': 'bug',
                          'user': { 'emails': ['pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                    'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                    'name': 'pingou'}},
               'project': { 'date_created': '1427441537',
                            'description': 'bar',
                            'id': 7,
                            'issue_tracker': True,
                            'name': 'foo',
                            'parent': None,
                            'project_docs': True,
                            'user': { 'emails': ['pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                      'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                      'name': 'pingou'}},
               'tags': ['easyfix', 'bug']},
      'msg_id': '2015-64ac444e-915c-4a6c-820b-59e8daf14584',
      'timestamp': 1427449624,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.issue.tag.added'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.issue.tag.added                                |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou tagged ticket foo#4: bug and easyfix           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/foo/issue/4                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['project/foo', 'issue/4'])                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |c41abbbc-80b3-465c-b8b5-9917cc0f0cfc-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |c41abbbc-80b3-465c-b8b5-9917cc0f0cfc-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |c41abbbc-80b3-465c-b8b5-9917cc0f0cfc-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |c41abbbc-80b3-465c-b8b5-9917cc0f0cfc-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.issue.tag.removed
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a someone removes a tag on a
ticket opened against a project on `pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.issue.tag.removed topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.issue.tag.removed>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 4,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'issue': { 'blocks': '',
                          'comments': [],
                          'content': 'report',
                          'date_created': '1427442217',
                          'depends': '',
                          'id': 4,
                          'private': False,
                          'status': 'Open',
                          'tags': '',
                          'title': 'bug',
                          'user': { 'emails': ['pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                    'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                    'name': 'pingou'}},
               'project': { 'date_created': '1427441537',
                            'description': 'bar',
                            'id': 7,
                            'issue_tracker': True,
                            'name': 'foo',
                            'parent': None,
                            'project_docs': True,
                            'user': { 'emails': ['pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                      'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                      'name': 'pingou'}},
               'tags': ['feature', 'future']},
      'msg_id': '2015-e1921852-c269-4c08-a611-dffe5c39417f',
      'timestamp': 1427450043,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.issue.tag.removed'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.issue.tag.removed                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou removed the feature and future tags from ticket foo#4 |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/foo/issue/4                                |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                              |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                      |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['project/foo', 'issue/4'])                              |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |dd99eff4-475b-4795-ae6b-b7faaf256804-icon|                  |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |dd99eff4-475b-4795-ae6b-b7faaf256804-secondary_icon|        |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |dd99eff4-475b-4795-ae6b-b7faaf256804-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |dd99eff4-475b-4795-ae6b-b7faaf256804-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.project.edit
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a someone edited a project on
`pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.project.edit topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.project.edit>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 2,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'fields': ['project_docs'],
               'project': { 'date_created': '1427441537',
                            'description': 'bar',
                            'id': 7,
                            'issue_tracker': True,
                            'name': 'foo',
                            'parent': None,
                            'project_docs': False,
                            'user': { 'emails': ['pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                      'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                      'name': 'pingou'}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-3b53c72a-8585-4ddc-ba60-d7e969a0acbb',
      'timestamp': 1427455343,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.project.edit'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.project.edit                                   |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou edited the project_docs fields of project foo  |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/foo                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['project/foo'])                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |d2ff0ddf-0807-4e35-91f0-5e10c76a32da-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |d2ff0ddf-0807-4e35-91f0-5e10c76a32da-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |d2ff0ddf-0807-4e35-91f0-5e10c76a32da-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |d2ff0ddf-0807-4e35-91f0-5e10c76a32da-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.project.forked
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a someone edited a tag of a
project on `pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.project.forked topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.project.forked>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 3,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'project': { 'date_created': '1427453169',
                            'description': '',
                            'id': 8,
                            'issue_tracker': True,
                            'name': 'fedmsg',
                            'parent': { 'date_created': '1426595173',
                                        'description': '',
                                        'id': 5,
                                        'issue_tracker': True,
                                        'name': 'fedmsg',
                                        'parent': None,
                                        'project_docs': True,
                                        'user': { 'emails': [ 'ralph@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                  'fullname': 'ralph',
                                                  'name': 'ralph'}},
                            'project_docs': True,
                            'user': { 'emails': ['pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                      'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                      'name': 'pingou'}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-7ec8cd76-8ed7-4360-ac32-2e881273a7c2',
      'timestamp': 1427456769,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.project.forked'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.project.forked                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou forked project "fedmsg" to "pingou/fedmsg"     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/fork/pingou/fedmsg                  |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['project/pingou/fedmsg'])                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |92165446-e173-49f2-b750-d6cef58c8cad-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |92165446-e173-49f2-b750-d6cef58c8cad-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |92165446-e173-49f2-b750-d6cef58c8cad-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |92165446-e173-49f2-b750-d6cef58c8cad-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.project.new
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a new project is created on
`pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.project.new topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.project.new>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 1,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'project': { 'date_created': '1427441537',
                            'description': 'bar',
                            'id': 7,
                            'issue_tracker': True,
                            'name': 'foo',
                            'parent': None,
                            'project_docs': True,
                            'user': { 'emails': ['pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                      'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                      'name': 'pingou'}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-a37b0f13-aead-40eb-ab53-7af8e89e6854',
      'timestamp': 1427445138,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.project.new'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.project.new                                    |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou created a new project "foo"                    |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/foo                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['project/foo'])                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |475bbdbc-9095-4377-bb30-484e4231ee87-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |475bbdbc-9095-4377-bb30-484e4231ee87-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |475bbdbc-9095-4377-bb30-484e4231ee87-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |475bbdbc-9095-4377-bb30-484e4231ee87-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.project.tag.edited
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a someone edited a tag of a
project on `pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.project.tag.edited topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.project.tag.edited>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 2,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'new_tag': 'easyfix',
               'old_tag': 'easyfix1',
               'project': { 'date_created': '1427441537',
                            'description': 'bar',
                            'id': 7,
                            'issue_tracker': True,
                            'name': 'foo',
                            'parent': None,
                            'project_docs': False,
                            'user': { 'emails': ['pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                      'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                      'name': 'pingou'}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-79d76ac7-5c66-460d-8a39-17849e462a85',
      'timestamp': 1427456487,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.project.tag.edited'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.project.tag.edited                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou altered tags on project foo from "easyfix1" to "easyfix" |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/foo                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                         |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['project/foo'])                                            |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |8ca48e57-b37f-4660-9511-e82b6c4d1948-icon|                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |8ca48e57-b37f-4660-9511-e82b6c4d1948-secondary_icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |8ca48e57-b37f-4660-9511-e82b6c4d1948-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |8ca48e57-b37f-4660-9511-e82b6c4d1948-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.project.tag.removed
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a someone removed a tag of a
project on `pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.project.tag.removed topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.project.tag.removed>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 5,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'project': { 'date_created': '1427441537',
                            'description': 'bar',
                            'id': 7,
                            'issue_tracker': True,
                            'name': 'foo',
                            'parent': None,
                            'project_docs': False,
                            'user': { 'emails': ['pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                      'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                      'name': 'pingou'}},
               'tags': ['easyfix1']},
      'msg_id': '2015-c6db4dd3-0a87-4eee-aab7-7758f566f36e',
      'timestamp': 1427455744,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.project.tag.removed'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.project.tag.removed                            |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou removed tags "easyfix1" from project foo       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/foo                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['project/foo'])                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |824b78ee-3410-42c2-a64f-56bdaa79e396-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |824b78ee-3410-42c2-a64f-56bdaa79e396-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |824b78ee-3410-42c2-a64f-56bdaa79e396-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |824b78ee-3410-42c2-a64f-56bdaa79e396-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.project.user.added
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a someone gave admins rights on a
project on `pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.project.user.added topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.project.user.added>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 4,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'new_user': 'ralph',
               'project': { 'date_created': '1427441537',
                            'description': 'bar',
                            'id': 7,
                            'issue_tracker': True,
                            'name': 'foo',
                            'parent': None,
                            'project_docs': False,
                            'user': { 'emails': ['pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                      'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                      'name': 'pingou'}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-b3c2e568-259a-4b1f-9ecc-79493b89687a',
      'timestamp': 1427455518,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.project.user.added'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.project.user.added                             |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou added "ralph" to project foo                   |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/foo                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['project/foo'])                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |7ba69b29-f52e-48ad-9acb-408678a9583c-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |7ba69b29-f52e-48ad-9acb-408678a9583c-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |7ba69b29-f52e-48ad-9acb-408678a9583c-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |7ba69b29-f52e-48ad-9acb-408678a9583c-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.pull-request.closed
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a someone merged a pull-request
of a project on `pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.pull-request.closed topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.pull-request.closed>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 3,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'merged': True,
               'pullrequest': { 'branch': 'master',
                                'branch_from': 'master',
                                'comments': [ { 'comment': 'awesome!',
                                                'commit': 'fa72f315373ec5f98f2b08c8ffae3645c97aaad2',
                                                'date_created': '1426843778',
                                                'filename': 'test',
                                                'id': 1,
                                                'line': 5,
                                                'parent': None,
                                                'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                          'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                          'name': 'pingou'}}],
                                'commit_start': '788efeaaf86bde8618f594a8181abb402e1dd904',
                                'commit_stop': '5ca3e1c7ccff3327ebeb2f07eaa9bf3820d3f5c8',
                                'date_created': '1426843732',
                                'id': 7,
                                'project': { 'date_created': '1426500194',
                                             'description': 'test project',
                                             'id': 1,
                                             'issue_tracker': True,
                                             'name': 'test',
                                             'parent': None,
                                             'project_docs': True,
                                             'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                       'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                       'name': 'pingou'}},
                                'repo_from': { 'date_created': '1426843440',
                                               'description': 'test project',
                                               'id': 6,
                                               'issue_tracker': True,
                                               'name': 'test',
                                               'parent': { 'date_created': '1426500194',
                                                           'description': 'test project',
                                                           'id': 1,
                                                           'issue_tracker': True,
                                                           'name': 'test',
                                                           'parent': None,
                                                           'project_docs': True,
                                                           'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                                     'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                                     'name': 'pingou'}},
                                               'project_docs': True,
                                               'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                         'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                         'name': 'pingou'}},
                                'status': False,
                                'title': 'test request',
                                'uid': 'd4182a2ac2d541d884742d3037c26e56',
                                'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                          'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                          'name': 'pingou'}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-22ec6669-91fe-4c32-b324-db80fba696dd',
      'timestamp': 1427458778,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.pull-request.closed'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.pull-request.closed                            |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou merged pull-request#7 of project "test"        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/test/pull-request/7                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['pull-request/7', 'project/test'])               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |af144ee6-7901-4aa6-bf1c-04429b3a62e8-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |af144ee6-7901-4aa6-bf1c-04429b3a62e8-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |af144ee6-7901-4aa6-bf1c-04429b3a62e8-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |af144ee6-7901-4aa6-bf1c-04429b3a62e8-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.pull-request.closed
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a someone closed a pull-request
of a project on `pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.pull-request.closed topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.pull-request.closed>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 2,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'merged': False,
               'pullrequest': { 'branch': 'master',
                                'branch_from': 'master',
                                'comments': [ { 'comment': "Sorry but this won't do",
                                                'commit': None,
                                                'date_created': '1427453701',
                                                'filename': None,
                                                'id': 16,
                                                'line': None,
                                                'parent': None,
                                                'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                          'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                          'name': 'pingou'}}],
                                'commit_start': '788efeaaf86bde8618f594a8181abb402e1dd904',
                                'commit_stop': '5ca3e1c7ccff3327ebeb2f07eaa9bf3820d3f5c8',
                                'date_created': '1426843718',
                                'id': 6,
                                'project': { 'date_created': '1426500194',
                                             'description': 'test project',
                                             'id': 1,
                                             'issue_tracker': True,
                                             'name': 'test',
                                             'parent': None,
                                             'project_docs': True,
                                             'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                       'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                       'name': 'pingou'}},
                                'repo_from': { 'date_created': '1426843440',
                                               'description': 'test project',
                                               'id': 6,
                                               'issue_tracker': True,
                                               'name': 'test',
                                               'parent': { 'date_created': '1426500194',
                                                           'description': 'test project',
                                                           'id': 1,
                                                           'issue_tracker': True,
                                                           'name': 'test',
                                                           'parent': None,
                                                           'project_docs': True,
                                                           'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                                     'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                                     'name': 'pingou'}},
                                               'project_docs': True,
                                               'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                         'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                         'name': 'pingou'}},
                                'status': False,
                                'title': 'test request',
                                'uid': '0a7d6b626b934511b6355dd48926916a',
                                'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                          'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                          'name': 'pingou'}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-c9636fda-3a4c-452b-85ee-870e29f63a03',
      'timestamp': 1427458544,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.pull-request.closed'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.pull-request.closed                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou closed (without merging) pull-request#6 of project "test" |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/test/pull-request/6                            |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                      |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['pull-request/6', 'project/test'])                          |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |ec0d46ee-72c7-409f-9d5c-ec1609342b0f-icon|                      |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |ec0d46ee-72c7-409f-9d5c-ec1609342b0f-secondary_icon|            |
+-----------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |ec0d46ee-72c7-409f-9d5c-ec1609342b0f-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |ec0d46ee-72c7-409f-9d5c-ec1609342b0f-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.pull-request.comment.added
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a someone commented on a
pull-request of a project on `pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.pull-request.comment.added topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.pull-request.comment.added>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 2,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'pullrequest': { 'branch': 'master',
                                'branch_from': 'master',
                                'comments': [ { 'comment': 'This is looking good!',
                                                'commit': None,
                                                'date_created': '1427453701',
                                                'filename': None,
                                                'id': 16,
                                                'line': None,
                                                'parent': None,
                                                'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                          'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                          'name': 'pingou'}}],
                                'commit_start': '788efeaaf86bde8618f594a8181abb402e1dd904',
                                'commit_stop': '5ca3e1c7ccff3327ebeb2f07eaa9bf3820d3f5c8',
                                'date_created': '1426843718',
                                'id': 6,
                                'project': { 'date_created': '1426500194',
                                             'description': 'test project',
                                             'id': 1,
                                             'issue_tracker': True,
                                             'name': 'test',
                                             'parent': None,
                                             'project_docs': True,
                                             'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                       'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                       'name': 'pingou'}},
                                'repo_from': { 'date_created': '1426843440',
                                               'description': 'test project',
                                               'id': 6,
                                               'issue_tracker': True,
                                               'name': 'test',
                                               'parent': { 'date_created': '1426500194',
                                                           'description': 'test project',
                                                           'id': 1,
                                                           'issue_tracker': True,
                                                           'name': 'test',
                                                           'parent': None,
                                                           'project_docs': True,
                                                           'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                                     'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                                     'name': 'pingou'}},
                                               'project_docs': True,
                                               'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                         'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                         'name': 'pingou'}},
                                'status': True,
                                'title': 'test request',
                                'uid': '0a7d6b626b934511b6355dd48926916a',
                                'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                          'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                          'name': 'pingou'}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-cbf24329-b51c-4160-983c-ffa45ef63863',
      'timestamp': 1427457362,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.pull-request.comment.added'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.pull-request.comment.added                     |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou commented on pull-request#6 of project "test"  |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/test/pull-request/6#comment-16      |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['pull-request/6', 'project/test'])               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |4469e2e4-249d-4d53-b589-c0d6a781c8b2-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |4469e2e4-249d-4d53-b589-c0d6a781c8b2-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |4469e2e4-249d-4d53-b589-c0d6a781c8b2-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |4469e2e4-249d-4d53-b589-c0d6a781c8b2-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.pull-request.flag.added
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a someone flags a pull-request
on a project on `pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.pull-request.flag.added topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.pull-request.flag.added>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 3,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'flag': { 'comment': 'Tests failed',
                         'date_created': '1433160759',
                         'percent': '0',
                         'pull_request_uid': 'cb0cc178203046fe86f675779b31b913',
                         'uid': 'jenkins_build_pagure_100+seed',
                         'url': 'http://jenkins.cloud.fedoraproject.org/',
                         'user': { 'default_email': 'bar@pingou.com',
                                   'emails': [ 'bar@pingou.com',
                                               'foo@pingou.com'],
                                   'fullname': 'PY C',
                                   'name': 'pingou'},
                         'username': 'Jenkins'},
               'pullrequest': { 'assignee': None,
                                'branch': 'master',
                                'branch_from': 'master',
                                'comments': [],
                                'commit_start': None,
                                'commit_stop': None,
                                'date_created': '1433160759',
                                'id': 1,
                                'project': { 'date_created': '1433160759',
                                             'description': 'test project #1',
                                             'id': 1,
                                             'name': 'test',
                                             'parent': None,
                                             'settings': { 'Minimum_score_to_merge_pull-request': -1,
                                                           'Only_assignee_can_merge_pull-request': False,
                                                           'Web-hooks': None,
                                                           'issue_tracker': True,
                                                           'project_documentation': True,
                                                           'pull_requests': True},
                                             'user': { 'default_email': 'bar@pingou.com',
                                                       'emails': [ 'bar@pingou.com',
                                                                   'foo@pingou.com'],
                                                       'fullname': 'PY C',
                                                       'name': 'pingou'}},
                                'repo_from': { 'date_created': '1433160759',
                                               'description': 'test project #1',
                                               'id': 1,
                                               'name': 'test',
                                               'parent': None,
                                               'settings': { 'Minimum_score_to_merge_pull-request': -1,
                                                             'Only_assignee_can_merge_pull-request': False,
                                                             'Web-hooks': None,
                                                             'issue_tracker': True,
                                                             'project_documentation': True,
                                                             'pull_requests': True},
                                               'user': { 'default_email': 'bar@pingou.com',
                                                         'emails': [ 'bar@pingou.com',
                                                                     'foo@pingou.com'],
                                                         'fullname': 'PY C',
                                                         'name': 'pingou'}},
                                'status': True,
                                'title': 'test pull-request',
                                'uid': 'cb0cc178203046fe86f675779b31b913',
                                'user': { 'default_email': 'bar@pingou.com',
                                          'emails': [ 'bar@pingou.com',
                                                      'foo@pingou.com'],
                                          'fullname': 'PY C',
                                          'name': 'pingou'}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-e7094e2a-1259-49da-91f5-635e81011ffa',
      'timestamp': 1433167960,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.pull-request.flag.added',
      'username': 'pingou'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.pull-request.flag.added                        |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | Jenkins flagged test#1 with "Tests failed"            |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/test/pull-request/1                 |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                       |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['pull-request/1', 'project/test'])               |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |a350f017-2318-48fe-a09e-28bdb8ad67f7-icon|           |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |a350f017-2318-48fe-a09e-28bdb8ad67f7-secondary_icon| |
+-----------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------+

.. |a350f017-2318-48fe-a09e-28bdb8ad67f7-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |a350f017-2318-48fe-a09e-28bdb8ad67f7-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.pull-request.flag.updated
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a someone updates a flag on a
pull-request on a project on `pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.pull-request.flag.updated topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.pull-request.flag.updated>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 4,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'flag': { 'comment': 'Tests passed',
                         'date_created': '1433160759',
                         'percent': '100',
                         'pull_request_uid': 'cb0cc178203046fe86f675779b31b913',
                         'uid': 'jenkins_build_pagure_101+seed',
                         'url': 'http://jenkins.cloud.fedoraproject.org/',
                         'user': { 'default_email': 'bar@pingou.com',
                                   'emails': [ 'bar@pingou.com',
                                               'foo@pingou.com'],
                                   'fullname': 'PY C',
                                   'name': 'pingou'},
                         'username': 'Jenkins'},
               'pullrequest': { 'assignee': None,
                                'branch': 'master',
                                'branch_from': 'master',
                                'comments': [],
                                'commit_start': None,
                                'commit_stop': None,
                                'date_created': '1433160759',
                                'id': 1,
                                'project': { 'date_created': '1433160759',
                                             'description': 'test project #1',
                                             'id': 1,
                                             'name': 'test',
                                             'parent': None,
                                             'settings': { 'Minimum_score_to_merge_pull-request': -1,
                                                           'Only_assignee_can_merge_pull-request': False,
                                                           'Web-hooks': None,
                                                           'issue_tracker': True,
                                                           'project_documentation': True,
                                                           'pull_requests': True},
                                             'user': { 'default_email': 'bar@pingou.com',
                                                       'emails': [ 'bar@pingou.com',
                                                                   'foo@pingou.com'],
                                                       'fullname': 'PY C',
                                                       'name': 'pingou'}},
                                'repo_from': { 'date_created': '1433160759',
                                               'description': 'test project #1',
                                               'id': 1,
                                               'name': 'test',
                                               'parent': None,
                                               'settings': { 'Minimum_score_to_merge_pull-request': -1,
                                                             'Only_assignee_can_merge_pull-request': False,
                                                             'Web-hooks': None,
                                                             'issue_tracker': True,
                                                             'project_documentation': True,
                                                             'pull_requests': True},
                                               'user': { 'default_email': 'bar@pingou.com',
                                                         'emails': [ 'bar@pingou.com',
                                                                     'foo@pingou.com'],
                                                         'fullname': 'PY C',
                                                         'name': 'pingou'}},
                                'status': True,
                                'title': 'test pull-request',
                                'uid': 'cb0cc178203046fe86f675779b31b913',
                                'user': { 'default_email': 'bar@pingou.com',
                                          'emails': [ 'bar@pingou.com',
                                                      'foo@pingou.com'],
                                          'fullname': 'PY C',
                                          'name': 'pingou'}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-e7094e2a-1259-49da-91f5-635e81011ffa',
      'timestamp': 1433167960,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.pull-request.flag.updated',
      'username': 'pingou'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.pull-request.flag.updated                         |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | Jenkins updated the flags on test#1 with: "Tests passed" |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/test/pull-request/1                    |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                              |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['pull-request/1', 'project/test'])                  |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |94d521ad-1f06-4632-8fdd-b17dcd1053dc-icon|              |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |94d521ad-1f06-4632-8fdd-b17dcd1053dc-secondary_icon|    |
+-----------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+

.. |94d521ad-1f06-4632-8fdd-b17dcd1053dc-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |94d521ad-1f06-4632-8fdd-b17dcd1053dc-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pagure.pull-request.new
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

These messages are published when a someone opens a new pull-request
on a project on `pagure <https://pagure.io>`_.

You can view the history of `messages with the pagure.pull-request.new topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=io.pagure.prod.pagure.pull-request.new>`_ or `all pagure messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pagure>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 4,
      'msg': { 'agent': 'pingou',
               'pullrequest': { 'branch': 'master',
                                'branch_from': 'test',
                                'comments': [],
                                'commit_start': None,
                                'commit_stop': None,
                                'date_created': '1427455470',
                                'id': 21,
                                'project': { 'date_created': '1426500194',
                                             'description': 'test project',
                                             'id': 1,
                                             'issue_tracker': True,
                                             'name': 'test',
                                             'parent': None,
                                             'project_docs': True,
                                             'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                       'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                       'name': 'pingou'}},
                                'repo_from': { 'date_created': '1426843440',
                                               'description': 'test project',
                                               'id': 6,
                                               'issue_tracker': True,
                                               'name': 'test',
                                               'parent': { 'date_created': '1426500194',
                                                           'description': 'test project',
                                                           'id': 1,
                                                           'issue_tracker': True,
                                                           'name': 'test',
                                                           'parent': None,
                                                           'project_docs': True,
                                                           'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                                     'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                                     'name': 'pingou'}},
                                               'project_docs': True,
                                               'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                                         'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                                         'name': 'pingou'}},
                                'status': True,
                                'title': 'Improve loading speed',
                                'uid': '2bf721f0fbd34977aab78b5e1959e504',
                                'user': { 'emails': [ 'pingou@fedoraproject.org'],
                                          'fullname': 'Pierre-YvesChibon',
                                          'name': 'pingou'}}},
      'msg_id': '2015-1f03dc6a-3a0b-4b09-a06d-e4ca7d374729',
      'timestamp': 1427459070,
      'topic': 'io.pagure.prod.pagure.pull-request.new'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pagure.pull-request.new                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | pingou opened pull-request#21: "Improve loading speed" on project "test" |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2link`            | https://pagure.io/test/pull-request/21                                   |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2agent`           | Unspecified                                                              |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2usernames`       | set(['pingou'])                                                          |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2packages`        | set([])                                                                  |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2objects`         | set(['pull-request/21', 'project/test'])                                 |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |682d0df5-ee7a-416f-acb4-218323e9d3b4-icon|                              |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2secondary_icon`  | |682d0df5-ee7a-416f-acb4-218323e9d3b4-secondary_icon|                    |
+-----------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------+

.. |682d0df5-ee7a-416f-acb4-218323e9d3b4-icon| image:: https://apps.fedoraproject.org/packages/images/icons/package_128x128.png
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px
.. |682d0df5-ee7a-416f-acb4-218323e9d3b4-secondary_icon| image:: https://seccdn.libravatar.org/avatar/01fe73d687f4db328da1183f2a1b5b22962ca9d9c50f0728aafeac974856311c?s=64&d=retro
   :height: 32px
   :width: 32px



pkgdb
-----

pkgdb.acl.delete
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The Fedora `Package DB <https://admin.fedoraproject.org/pkgdb>`_
publishes messages like these when an admin **deletes a branch** of a
particular package.

You can view the history of `messages with the pkgdb.acl.delete topic <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?topic=org.fedoraproject.prod.pkgdb.acl.delete>`_ or `all pkgdb messages <https://apps.fedoraproject.org/datagrepper/raw?category=pkgdb>`_ in datagrepper.

.. code-block:: python

    { 'i': 23,
      'msg': { 'acl': { 'acl': 'watchcommits',
                        'fas_name': 'awjb',
                        'packagelist': { 'collection': { 'branchname': 'f20',
                                                         'dist_tag': '.fc20',
                                                         'koji_name': 'f20',
                                                         'name': 'Fedora',
                                                         'status': 'Active',
                                                         'version': '20'},
                                         'critpath': False,
                                         'package': { 'acls': [],
                                                      'creation_date': 1404850009.0,
                                                      'description': '',
                                                      'name': 'pipelight',
                                                      'review_url': 'https://bugzilla.redhat.com/1117403',
                                                      'status': 'Approved',
                                                      'summary': 'NPAPI Wrapper Plugin for using Windows plugins in Linux browsers',
                                                      'upstream_url': 'http://pipelight.net/'},
                                         'point_of_contact': 'besser82',
                                         'status': 'Approved',
                                         'status_change': 1404850010.0},
                        'status': 'Approved'},
               'agent': 'ausil'},
      'msg_id': '2014-f46f0993-ea29-4fe1-af44-807b863a12de',
      'source_name': 'datanommer',
      'source_version': '0.6.4',
      'timestamp': 1408377918.0,
      'topic': 'org.fedoraproject.prod.pkgdb.acl.delete'}


The example message above, when passed to various routines in the
:mod:`fedmsg.meta` module, will produce the following outputs:

+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2title`           | pkgdb.acl.delete                                              |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2subtitle`        | ausil deleted awjb's watchcommits rights from pipelight (f20) |
+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+

+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+

+-----------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------+
| :func:`fedmsg.meta.msg2icon`            | |48ba6618-bee2-48f6-bcdc-b784ec007f80-icon|                   |
